Timing of the tweet: The expert mentions that the timing of Nike's tweet coincided with the actual coin toss, which led many viewers to assume that the photo was authentic.
Matching jersey colors: The expert notes that the colors of the jerseys in the photo matched the colors worn by the players on the field, adding to the perception of authenticity.
Presence of Nike symbol: The expert points out that the Nike symbol displayed in the top right-hand corner of the image indicated that it was a clever advertisement for Nike, suggesting that the photo was not a real capture of the coin toss.
Discrepancies in jersey numbers: The expert mentions that SB Nation highlighted that the jersey numbers in the Nike photo did not correlate with the numbers worn by the actual football players who participated in the coin toss, casting doubt on the authenticity of the image.
